Improvements.Improvement: Use parameterized test instead of repetitive code
Improvements.Change_Diff: Replace repetitive assertions with a parameterized test.
Improvements.Description: The code has a lot of repetitive assertions. Using a parameterized test will remove the repetition and make the code cleaner and more maintainable. In addition, it allows to easily add more test cases in the future.

Improvements.Improvement: Use private constants for repeated literals
Improvements.Change_Diff:
- final int k=512;
+ private static final int K=512;
Improvements.Description: The code uses the literal k repeatedly. It would be better to define it as a private constant to avoid potential typos and make the code easier to maintain.
